column1: #Text=" Aang says : " Uh , why are they all looking at me like that ?
#Text=" Kanna says : " Well , no one has seen an airbender in a hundred years .
#Text=We thought they were extinct , until my granddaughter and grandson found you .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , this is my grandmother .
#Text=" Kanna says : " Call me Gran - Gran .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What is this , a weapon ?
#Text=You ca n't stab anything with this !
#Text=" Aang says : " It 's not for stabbing !
#Text=It lets me control the air currents around my glider and fly .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Ya know , last time I checked , humans ca n't fly !
#Text=Together you can just waste time all day long .
#Text=" Kanna says : " All right , no more playing .
#Text=" Katara says : " I told you , he 's the real thing Gran - Gran !
#Text=I finally found a bender to teach me !
#Text=" Kanna says : " Katara , try not to put all your hopes in this boy .
#Text=I sense he 's filled with much wisdom .
#Text=Now my tongue is stuck to my staff !
